description: This file defines the FilterScreen widget and related UI components for a Flutter app. It provides a user interface for filtering options such as height, weight, hair color, ethnicity, and religion, complete with state management, animations, and scroll-to-section functionality.

classes.name: FilterScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget providing the main filter interface with sections for different filter criteria, reset, and apply actions.

classes.name: _FilterBody
classes.description: A StatefulWidget containing the scrollable body of filter sections with dynamic content and interaction logic.

classes.name: _FilterBodyState
classes.description: State class managing internal state of filter sliders, scroll position, and section highlighting.

classes.name: _SectionCard
classes.description: A styled card widget for each filter section.

classes.name: _AnimatedSectionCard
classes.description: A wrapper widget that adds a pulsing highlight animation to sections.

classes.name: _SectionHeader
classes.description: A widget representing the header of each filter section, including icon, title, and optional range chip.

classes.name: _HeaderChip
classes.description: A small badge widget used to display the current range values in section headers.

methods.name: _onReset
methods.description: Resets the filter criteria through provider and shows a snackbar confirmation.

methods.name: _onResetLocal
methods.description: Resets local slider values and triggers a snackbar confirmation.

methods.name: _buildEnumCheckboxGroup
methods.description: Builds a list of checkbox items for enum options such as hair color, religion, ethnicity.

methods.name: _enumLabel
methods.description: Converts enum names to user-friendly display labels.
